name: Fiber Savvy
overview: Fiber Savvy has been supplying solutions to the telecommunications and networking industry for many years, and has grown from what was once a small company to a major industry supplier. Fiber Savvy is supported by a network of companies around the globe that specialize in all aspects of the networking and connectivity. As part of their ongoing commitment to quality, Fiber Savvy products are made in compliant with ISO 9001:2000 standards. They pay special attention to providing reliable, high quality products. Their products are UL, CUL listed, ETL listed or verified and ROHS compliant. They meet and/or exceed TIA/EIA Certification and standards. Fiber Savvy has developed a solid foundation that enables them to offer their customers the finest quality products at very competitive prices.
